name: MedousaGame
description:
The protagonist, a Gorgon-like character named Misty, strolls through the mansion.
Her eyes have strange powers and can turn what she sees into stone or power a switch.

This game is a prototype and will eventually add sound and music, as well as a story and more puzzles.

All the soldiers are trying to capture Misty.

"Soldier" will be petrified and rendered harmless if they continue to glare.
"Shy Soldier" do not like to be seen.
"Sunglasses Soldier"  doesn't see anything.
Don't let the cat be petrified.

Mouse -- Look Around

Click and Hold -- Move

F -- Grab Item

Tab -- Menu (It does not work except for Restart "リスタート".)
